metadata.name: Fluid Quads
metadata.description:
The art piece is created using 100% manual coding. 

The art piece is based on different mathematical expressions, mainly Trigonometric functions such as Sine and Cosine values of an angle.

There is a total of 24 squares. 16 out of those are moving under the influence of the same mathematical formula, and 8 are moving with the reverse movement.

This art style is not to be confused with AI-generated art. This is pure manual coding and drawing and plotting x and y coordinates of the shape and influencing them using Trigonometry or Perlin Noise Algorithm
